channel.title: Lasers on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Lasers on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Peacock Feathers Are Stunning. They Can Also Emit Laser Beams
item.description: Scientists hope their plumage project could someday lead to biocompatible lasers that could safely be embedded in the human body.

item.title: Peacock Feathers Are Stunning. They Can Also Emit Laser Beams
item.description: Scientists hope their plumage project could someday lead to biocompatible lasers that could safely be embedded in the human body.

item.title: Peacock feathers can emit laser beams
item.description: The feathers can emit two frequencies of laser light from multiple regions across their colored eyespots.
